name: I want to wake every day at 7 am with Jazz music.

speech:
Sure! Here's a general guide on how you can set up a recurring alarm to wake you up at 7 AM with Jazz music:

Using a physical alarm clock:

1. Locate your alarm clock and identify the controls for setting the alarm time and alarm sound. This may involve buttons, knobs, or switches, depending on the type of alarm clock you have.
2. Set the alarm time to 7 AM by adjusting the controls accordingly.
3. Select Jazz music as the alarm sound. This may involve choosing a preset sound or tuning to a Jazz radio station if your alarm clock has those features.
4. Verify that the alarm is properly set for 7 AM with Jazz music by checking the alarm time and sound settings on the clock.

Using a clock app on a smartphone or computer:

1. Open the clock app on your smartphone or computer. This may be a built-in clock app or a third-party clock app that you have installed.
2. Navigate to the alarm settings or alarm clock section of the app, which allows you to set alarms.
3. Create a new alarm for 7 AM by selecting the "Add New Alarm" or similar option and setting the alarm time accordingly.
4. Choose Jazz music as the alarm sound. This may involve selecting a preset sound or choosing a Jazz music file from your device's music library.
5. Save or apply the changes to create the alarm for 7 AM with Jazz music.

Please note that the specific steps and options may vary depending on the type of alarm clock or clock app you are using, so it's always best to refer to the user manual or help documentation for your specific device or app for detailed instructions on how to set alarms and customize alarm sounds.

According to web search results, one way to wake up with jazz music is to use a smart speaker like Amazon Alexa or Google Assistant and set a music alarm with a voice command. For example, you can say "Hey Google, set a jazz music alarm for 7 AM tomorrow". Alternatively, you can play a jazz music playlist on YouTube or Spotify on your device and set a regular alarm for 7 AM.

Source: Conversation 24/4/2023

(1) How to set a music alarm with Amazon Alexa or Google Assistant. https://www.pocket-lint.com/how-to-ask-amazon-alexa-or-google-assistant-to-set-music-alarms/ Accessed 24/4/2023.

(2) Good Morning JAZZ - Strong Coffee Jazz For Wake Up, Breakfast, Work .... https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TJkHo4oDY90 Accessed 24/4/2023.

(3) Wake Up JAZZ - Happy Jazz Playlist For Morning, Work, Study. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WECkGESdHCE Accessed 24/4/2023.

You can set a jazz music alarm for 7 AM using Amazon Alexa or Google Assistant. You can say "Hey Google, set a jazz music alarm for 7 AM tomorrow" to set a one-time alarm¹. If you want to wake up with jazz music every day at 7 AM, you can say "Okay Google, set a media alarm for 7 AM every day" to set a recurring music alarm¹.

Alternatively, you can listen to jazz music playlists on YouTube or Spotify to wake up with jazz music every day at 7 AM. Here are some playlists that you might like:

- Good Morning JAZZ - Strong Coffee Jazz For Wake Up, Breakfast, Work 

- Wake Up JAZZ - Happy Jazz Playlist For Morning, Work, Study 

I hope this helps!

Source: Conversation, 24/4/2023
(1) How to set a music alarm with Amazon Alexa or Google Assistant. https://www.pocket-lint.com/how-to-ask-amazon-alexa-or-google-assistant-to-set-music-alarms/ Accessed 24/4/2023.

(2) Good Morning JAZZ - Strong Coffee Jazz For Wake Up, Breakfast, Work .... https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TJkHo4oDY90 Accessed 24/4/2023.

(3) Wake Up JAZZ - Happy Jazz Playlist For Morning, Work, Study. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WECkGESdHCE Accessed 24/4/2023.

(4) Happy Morning Cafe Music - Relaxing Jazz & Bossa Nova Music For Work .... https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GkqhHEAy1zw Accessed 24/4/2023.
That sounds like a great way to start your day! You can set an alarm on your phone or smart speaker to play Jazz music at 7 am every day. Do you need help setting it up?
